detail_desc: Dress with a lace bodice and chiffon skirt. Round neckline, short cap sleeves, a zip at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft jersey. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and wide, straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Jumper knitted in soft chenille yarn with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a double-layered trim at the top, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder dress in airy jersey made from recycled polyester with elastication at the top and short, wide sleeves.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist and legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and slits at the hems.
Jumpsuit in a patterned weave with a V-neck, buttons at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and straight, ankle-length legs.

V-neck bra top in microfibre with a lined front, wide shoulder straps and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Folded, glued edges at the top for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes. No fasteners.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in woven fabric with buttons down the front, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam at the waist.
Top in soft, striped cotton jersey with a text print and long sleeves. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Dungaree shorts in a soft cotton weave with press studs at the sides and adjustable straps with a press-stud at the front. Fake front pockets, a real back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Skirt in glittery tulle with an elasticated waist and satin underskirt.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and a press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 1-4Y without a press-stud).
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal chain decoration and a metal buckle. Width 1.8 cm.
Flared top in soft jersey with an elasticated neckline, flounce that continues over the shoulders and overlocked edges.
Trousers in a patterned viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Short jacket in washed cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front, side pockets and long sleeves. Unlined.
Top in soft jersey with a glittery print motif on the front, short sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
A-line dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave. Square neckline front and back with narrow, covered elastication at the top and flutter sleeves. Unlined.
Blouse in airy satin with a lace yoke, sewn in wrapover at the front and a V-neck with a concealed button. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Mittens in a soft knit with a cable-knit section on the uppers and a front flap that can be fastened back with a button to reveal a pair of fingerless gloves. Ribbed, foldover cuffs.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 68x180 cm.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Thong briefs in lace with a mid waist and lined gusset.
Blouse in a crisp weave with gathered seams at the front, back and sides. Opening and button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip in one side and long puff sleeves. Unlined.
Top in jersey made from recycled polyester with a boat neck and short puff sleeves.

Wide, airy blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a wide collar that ties at the front, and buttons at the top. Yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long, wide sleeves, and cuffs with covered buttons.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length trousers in a patterned weave with a high waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Pencil skirt in a stretch weave with decorative seams front and back and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Lined.
Calf-length flared skirt in a cotton weave with lacing at the front. Wide, reinforced waist with support panels and pleats, and a concealed zip at the back.
Knee-length shorts in washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with decorative seams at the knees.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a collar and V-neck with a pleat at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Cropped top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Backless jumpsuit in glittery jersey with a deep V-neck and long sleeves. Horizontal strap at the top of the back, a seam at the waist, a concealed zip at the back and straight, wide legs. Lined.
5-pocket denim jeans with ultra-flexible stretch that keeps them in shape while providing full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, an elasticated waist, lined front and slightly longer legs.
Baby Exclusive. Set with a vest top and pair of puff pants in a soft organic cotton double weave. Vest top with narrow shoulder straps and puff pants with elastication at the waist and legs. Lined.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Skirt in a gently crêped weave with a high waist, pleats at the top and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
3/4-length leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh racer back, lightly padded cups with removable inserts and a wide elasticated hem. Extra firm support.
Hair clips in metal decorated with beads.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with a wrapover front, wide flounce at the front and hem, and concealed zip in one side. Partly lined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a rib-knit turtle neck, long raglan sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted gilet in fast-drying, breathable thermal fleece with a hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front and mesh-lined side pockets with a zip. Unlined.

Set with a vest top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a decorative knot detail on each shoulder strap and a print motif. Shorts with side pockets and an elasticated waist with a decorative knot detail.
Hat in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a turned-up hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a sequined motif and appliqué on the front and concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Jacket in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Set with a dungaree dress and top in soft cotton. Dress in slightly stretchy narrow-wale corduroy with straps, a flounced trim at the top and metal press-studs at the back. Unlined. Long-sleeved top in patterned jersey.
Flared, sleeveless dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with frill-trimmed gathered seams around the skirt. Unlined.
Set with a top and pair of puff pants in a soft weave. Top with an elasticated neckline and short cap sleeves. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and elasticated, frill-trimmed hems.

Shirt jacket in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs and a straight-cut hem with slits in the sides. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired, V-neck body in lace and mesh with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support.Lined gusset with press-studs and a high cut at the back.
Joggers in heavy sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and slits in the sides.
Maxi dress in a crinkled weave with a sheen. V-neck and narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back. Elasticated seam under the bust and slits in the sides. Half-lined.
Fitted, long-sleeved dress in pattern-weave jersey with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist and sewn-in creases at the front.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Wide blouse in an airy viscose weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, wide, buttoned cuffs with a slit, and a rounded hem.
Jumpsuit in an airy, patterned weave with short butterfly sleeves and press-studs on one shoulder. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Waistcoat in twill made from a viscose blend with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined. The polyester content of the waistcoat is recycled.
Knee-length dress in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Unlined.
Oversized, V-neck jumper in a fine-knit mohair blend containing some merino wool. Long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in a marled cotton knit with a lined hood, zip down the front with a leather tab, side pockets, and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a drawstring hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif on the front.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in pleated jersey with a V-neck, an elasticated seam and narrow tie belt at the waist and a raw-edge hem. Partly lined.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake coin pocket, fake back pockets and slim legs.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Joggers in sturdy jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly with buttons, side pockets, a back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
